txt.en: '[placeholder], I have received word from Falasgon at Echad Sirion: the second enemy encampment has been discovered. It appears, though, that this encampment is not nearly the threat that Ash√∫rz Maufulug had been.\n\n'You should travel to Echad Mothelen, far to the north-east from here, in the western part of the Dourstocks, and speak with the patrol captain, Mothelen. He will be able to tell you more.'
'Welcome, [placeholder], though I wish it were less disturbing circumstances. Something queer is afoot in this place, and we need your help learning exactly what that is.'
'Hurry to Echad Mothelen, [placeholder]. Mothelen has need of your assistance.'
The Malledhrim of Echad Sirion have discovered the location of yet another enemy encampment.
Talk to Mothelen at Echad Mothelen

Mothelen is at Echad Mothelen, far to the north-east from Amon Angened.\n\nDannaswen has suggested you speak with Mothelen regarding the recently discovered enemy encampment in the western Dourstocks.
